DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to collect outcomes information to see what effects photon/proton beam radiation has on nasopharynx cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Photon/Proton Radiation Therapy for Carcinoma of the Nasopharynx
DOC.detailed_description: Data collection will be obtained from the patient's medical records including initial evaluation, pathology report, dosimetry information, radiotherapy completion records and follow-up.
DOC.criteria: * Nasopharynx cancer. Evidence of distant metastasis. Previous radiation for head and neck cancer.
